hasAttributes.name: accountId
hasAttributes.description: General Ledger Account code for this supplier. Can be including sub-account id. It can contain many different levels to identify the Account. It could include cost centres such as company, division, region, group and branch/department.

hasAttributes.name: additionalAddressDetail
hasAttributes.description: Additional detail required for the address

hasAttributes.name: addressAddressType
hasAttributes.description: Field to differentiate between multiple addresses. To indicate the type of address. Choose from the predefined enumeration. (examples: StreetAddress PostalAddress, BillingAddress)

hasAttributes.name: addressBuilding
hasAttributes.description: The physical street address line 2 of the supplier.

hasAttributes.name: addressCity
hasAttributes.description: The physical city where the customer is located.

hasAttributes.name: addressCountry
hasAttributes.description: The country code where the supplier is physically located. Recommend ISO 3166-1 Alpha 2 or ISO 3166-1 Alpha 3 format (XX or XXX).

hasAttributes.name: addressNumber
hasAttributes.description: The physical street address line 1 of the supplier.

hasAttributes.name: addressPostalCode
hasAttributes.description: The zip code of the city where the customer is physically located.

hasAttributes.name: addressRegion
hasAttributes.description: The physical state or province where the customer is located. Recommend ISO 3166-2.

hasAttributes.name: addressStreetName
hasAttributes.description: The physical Street where the customer is located.

hasAttributes.name: bankAccountId
hasAttributes.description: Unambiguous identification of the account to which credit and debit entries are made.

hasAttributes.name: bankAccountName
hasAttributes.description: The name of the individual or company holding the bank account.

hasAttributes.name: bankAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: The number allocated to the account by the individual's or company's own bank.

hasAttributes.name: companyType
hasAttributes.description: Type of company of the supplier, e.g. B2B, B2C, manufacturing, limited company or similar

hasAttributes.name: effectiveDate
hasAttributes.description: Date the vendor declared active.

hasAttributes.name: email
hasAttributes.description: Email address of the primary contact.

hasAttributes.name: expirationDate
hasAttributes.description: Date the vendor was declared inactive.

hasAttributes.name: fax
hasAttributes.description: Fax number for the supplier

hasAttributes.name: firstName
hasAttributes.description: The first (given) name of the person.

hasAttributes.name: IBANNumber
hasAttributes.description: International Bank Account Number, ISO 13616

hasAttributes.name: lastName
hasAttributes.description: The last (family) name of the person.

hasAttributes.name: legalEntityIdentifier
hasAttributes.description: third party registration number given by local authorities/local regulators Eg: Company registration number

hasAttributes.name: name
hasAttributes.description: The name of the supplier.

hasAttributes.name: paymentDiscountDays
hasAttributes.description: The number of days from the invoice date the supplier allows to take advantage of discounted terms. Terms are represented as digits with no decimal places (for example, nnn).

hasAttributes.name: paymentDiscountPercentage
hasAttributes.description: The discount percentage the supplier may provide if an invoice is paid before a certain number of days. In the flat file, terms are represented as digits to one decimal place (for example, 10% would be represented as 10.0). In extensible business reporting language global ledger taxonomy framework (XBRL GL), the three fields Terms_Discount_Percentage, Terms_Discount_Days and Terms_Due_Days would be entered in the form "xx.x% dd Net dd," such as 2% 10 Net 30 for 2% discount if paid within 10 days, with the net due in 30 days.

hasAttributes.name: paymentDueDays
hasAttributes.description: The number of days allowed to meet the obligation before an invoice becomes overdue.

hasAttributes.name: registrationNumber
hasAttributes.description: Unique number to identify the company in the accounting records, issued by a government authority or created by the company for internal purposes to identify different entities within their corporate group.

hasAttributes.name: selfBillingIndicator
hasAttributes.description: Indicator showing if a self-billing agreement exists between the customer and the supplier

hasAttributes.name: sortCode
hasAttributes.description: Identifier for the bank branch at which the account is held. May be needed to uniquely identify the account.

hasAttributes.name: supplierCreditLimit
hasAttributes.description: The credit limit for the total outstanding balance approved for the supplier.

hasAttributes.name: supplierGroup
hasAttributes.description: If the organization segments suppliers into groups, the group to which this supplier is assigned.

hasAttributes.name: supplierId
hasAttributes.description: Identifier of the supplier to whom payment is due or from whom unused credits have been applied. Must match the Supplier_Account_ID in the Supplier_Listing_YYYYMMDD file.

hasAttributes.name: supplierType
hasAttributes.description: The type of supplier

hasAttributes.name: systemApprovedDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date  and time the entry was approved.

hasAttributes.name: systemApprovedUser
hasAttributes.description: User ID (from User_Listing file) for person who approved the entry.

hasAttributes.name: systemEntryDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date the transaction was entered into the system. This is sometimes referred to as the  creation date. This should be a system- generated date (rather than user-entered date), when possible. This date does not  necessarily correspond with the date of the  transaction itself.

hasAttributes.name: systemEntryUser
hasAttributes.description: User_ID (from User_Listing file) for person who created the record.

hasAttributes.name: systemModifiedDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date and time the entry was last modified.

hasAttributes.name: systemModifiedUser
hasAttributes.description: User_ID (from User_Listing file) for the last person modifying this entry.

hasAttributes.name: taxAuthority
hasAttributes.description: Identification of the Revenue Body to which this TaxType refers.

hasAttributes.name: taxNumber
hasAttributes.description: The supplier's tax identification number.

hasAttributes.name: taxRegistrationNumber
hasAttributes.description: Unique number issued by a Revenue Body for use by the company.

hasAttributes.name: taxType
hasAttributes.description: Tax type for look-up in tables

hasAttributes.name: taxVerificationDate
hasAttributes.description: The date that the tax registration details referred to above were last checked.

hasAttributes.name: primaryContactTelephone
hasAttributes.description: Phone number of the primary contact at the supplier.

hasAttributes.name: primaryContactTitle
hasAttributes.description: The title of the person (for example, accounting manager).

hasAttributes.name: transactionCreditLimit
hasAttributes.description: The per invoice credit limit established with this supplier.

hasAttributes.name: website
hasAttributes.description: URL of supplier website

hasAttributes.name: primaryCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Supplier's primary currency

hasAttributes.name: secondaryEmail
hasAttributes.description: Supplier's Secondary contact email ID

hasAttributes.name: secondaryTelephone
hasAttributes.description: Supplier's Secondary contact telephone #

hasAttributes.name: registrationCountry
hasAttributes.description: Supplier Country of registration( USA , UK , India )

hasAttributes.name: registrationState
hasAttributes.description: Supplier State of Registration ( Texas, NC , SC , Virginia)

hasAttributes.name: registrationPlace
hasAttributes.description: Supplier Place of registration ( Could be district Eg: Houston , Raleigh, Durham etc )

hasAttributes.name: modeOfPayment
hasAttributes.description: Should identify mode of payment , cash , check , account transfer etc
